title.narrative: Resilience through Economic Empowerment Climate Adaptation Leadership & Learning

description.narrative: The goal of the project is "Women and Men most at risk of disaster and climate change in Bangladesh are able to thrive in spite of shocks and change". To achieve the goal, the project is intended to achieve four outcome. Community capacity building, economic empowerment, rights and entitlement and transformational women leadership are the major area to be achieved. The project will be implemented in the Char, Haor and coastal region of Bangladesh from April 2014 to March 2017.

mailing-address.narrative: Oxfam House, John Smith Drive, Oxford, OX4 2JY

sector.narrative: Right to Equity: Gender and Diversity
